عندما تتذكر للحظاتها اللأخييرة ، أدركت أن عائللتها كانت تكذب عللييها طوالل اللوقت. للذللك عندما ييتم إرجاعها إللى اللماضيي ، فإنها مصممة عللى منع موتها ومعاللجة Karshian بشكلل صحييح هذه اللمرة. للكن هذا للن ييكون سهللاً عندما للا ييثق كارشييان فيي كلل خطوة للاتييا. هلل ستتمكن للاتييا من اللفوز عللى كارشييان وقللب اللطاوللة عللى عائللتها هذه اللمرة ، أم أنها محكوم عللييها باللموت مرة أخرى","de":"Als sein Vater zur See fahren muss, wird Karshian mit offenen Armen von Latias Familie aufgenommen, aber nachdem Gerüchte lautwerden, dass dieser auf See umgekommen sei, behandelt die Familie Karshian wie einen lästigen Parasiten. Angestachelt von ihren sadistischen Eltern und gierig nach Bestätigung, macht auch Latia Karshian das Leben zur Hölle. Eines Tages jedoch kehrt Karshians Vater als Held und mächtiger Herzog zurück und Karshian nimmt Rache an seinen Peinigern, indem er kurzerhand die gesamte Familie hinrichten lässt. Während ihrer eigenen Hinrichtung offenbaren Latias Eltern ihr wahres, manipulatives Gesicht. Zu ihrer Überraschung erwacht Latia daraufhin in der Vergangenheit und nimmt sich zum Ziel, ihren Tod zu verhindern und Karshian diesmal gut zu behandeln. Letzteres gestaltet sich denkbar schwierig – schließlich traut Karshian ihr absolut nicht über den Weg. Wird Latia es also schaffen, Karshian von ihrer Aufrichtigkeit zu überzeugen und Rache an ihrer Familie zu nehmen? Oder ist sie dazu verdammt, ein weiteres Mal zu sterben?","en":"Originally, Latia's family had taken in Karshian as a favor to his father, who embarked on a maritime expedition for fame and fortune. However, after rumors begin to spread that the father had died at sea, they begin treating the young boy like a parasite. Egged on by her sadistic parents and desperate for their approval, Latia bullies Karshian relentlessly. When Karshian's father returns as a national hero and powerful duke, Karshian gets his revenge by executing Latia's entire family, including her of course! On the gallows, as her life flashes before her eyes, she realizes that her family had been lying to her and using her all along. So when she's thrown back into the past, she's determined to prevent her death and treat Karshian right this time. But this won't be easy as Karshian distrusts Latia's every move. Will Latia be able to win over Karshian and turn the tables on her family this time around, or is she doomed to die once more?","es":"La familia de Latia acogió a Karshian cuando su padre se fue a una expedición marítima, pero después de que corrieron rumores de que estaba muerto, lo tratan como a un parásito. Instigada por sus padres sádicos y desesperada por su aprobación, Latia acosa a Karshian sin descanso. Sin embargo, cuando el padre de Karshian regresa como héroe nacional y poderoso duque, ¡Karshian se venga ejecutando a toda la familia de Latia! Mientras recuerda sus últimos momentos, se da cuenta de que su familia le había estado mintiendo todo el tiempo. Entonces, cuando es arrojada al pasado, está decidida a evitar su muerte y tratar a Karshian bien esta vez. Pero esto no será fácil cuando Karshian desconfíe de cada movimiento de Latia. ¿Podrá Latia ganarse a Karshian y darle la vuelta a su familia esta vez? ¿O está condenada a morir una vez más?","fr":"La famille de Latia a accueilli Karshian lorsque son père est parti en expédition maritime, mais après que des rumeurs circulent selon lesquelles il est mort, ils le traitent comme un parasite. Cependant, lorsque le père de Karshian revient en tant que héros national et puissant duc, Karshian prend sa revanche en exécutant toute la famille de Latia! Alors qu'elle se remémore ses derniers instants, elle se rend compte que sa famille lui a toujours menti. Ainsi, lorsqu'elle est renvoyée dans le passé, elle est déterminée à empêcher sa mort et à traiter correctement Karshian cette fois. They were a hunter-gatherer people nurtured by rich nature, and they were an ethnic group with a unique culture that excelled in singing and dancing. However, when the Japanese government began to develop Hokkaido in the Meiji era, the situation changed. The Ainu were driven out of the land they lived in and were forced to become Japanese under the so-called \"assimilation policy.\" The Ainu had language, but not letters. Thanks to Japanese language education, some people have gradually come to be unable to speak the Ainu language. Even the spiritual foundation of the Ainu language was being lost. Meanwhile, an Ainu girl, Yukie Chiri, and an Ainu language researcher, Kyosuke Kindaichi, have a fateful meeting. Her natural brilliance and her great storyteller from her grandmother, her Sachie was unique in her mastery of Ainu and Japanese. Together with Kindaichi, Yukie begins a big project that will last her life. It is \"Ainu Shinyoshu\"."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe"}

I thought my future would be bright but I didn't realize that the place I reincarnated into was a discontinued R-19 tragic BL novel that my friend wrote. And of all things, I became the older twin sister of Lisandro, the crazy obsessive yandere male lead who horribly, brutally murdered the sickly prisoner Frey at the end of the novel. Had I not remembered this, I would have just skipped into the sunset, blissfully unaware…\n\n\"Noona!\"\n\nWith a suitcase in one hand, I flinched and looked behind me. The mysteriously beautiful Frey came towards me with a bright smile on his lips. In no time, he towered over me with his tall, lean body.\n\n\"Where are you going?\"\n\n\"Um.\"\n\n\"Where?\"\n\n*Don't ask.* I wanted to say that firmly, but I just wore a smile instead. Frey, who kept staring me, tried to grab my suitcase. Taken aback, I held onto it tightly. In return, I heard a refreshing, clear laugh.\n\n\"Let me hold it for you.\"\n\n\"No, I\"m fine.\"\n\n\"Why? Oh, I get it. You're trying to escape. Am I getting in your way?\"\n\nThe hand holding the suitcase flinched. As he looked at me with an eerie smile, he looked exceedingly dangerous the more he stared. There was ice glistening behind his golden irises.\n\n\"You thought I wouldn't know,\" his large hand wrapped around mine and held the suitcase handle tightly, \"Just to avoid me and that bastard, you're trying to run away.\"\n\nHis harsh words didn’t match his aloof expression.\n\n\"It'll spell trouble, Yuni. If you disappear from my sight.\"\n\nThe gentle and feeble, sickly prisoner suddenly had became an obsessive yandere himself.\n\n---\nAfter being reborn as a wealthy duchess's daughter, Yurenia Rohelio thought she’d live her days rolling in cash. Unfortunately, she’s also fated to die at the hands of her obsessive, villainous brother Lysandro! To secure a happy ending, Yurenia has little choice but to train her psychotic twin while he's still young so he doesn't become a villain! Aber während sie sich auf ihr extravagantes Leben als Lady vorbereitet, beginnt ihr Vater nach einem geeigneten Ehemann für sie zu suchen. Aus Angst, dass er sie an den berüchtigt launischen Prinzen verheiraten wird, kommt sie zu einer verzweifelten Lösung: ein Dating-Vertrag. Und der beste Kandidat dafür ist kein anderer als der Schüler ihres Vaters.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52616424)\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://wordexcerpt.com/series/daddy-i-dont-want-to-marry/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EB%B9%A0-%EB%82%98-%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%95%88-%ED%95%A0%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/2472), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56556599)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9772/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%88%B8%E7%88%B8%E6%88%91%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A/101)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ayah-Aku-Tidak-Mau-Menikah/37)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66124)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD_%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/125)","en":"I’m Juvelian? The daughter of the duke and the villainess of this novel? I managed to avoid my death with some previous knowledge about my life, as this was my second time at it. Now, I should be able to live a peaceful life!\n\n“I’m not going to marry a man unless he has everything. I want the most wealthy, famous, and competent man there is.”\n\nI dreamt of a glamorous life as the daughter of the duke, but my father tells me the Crown Prince who is known to be a lunatic is to be my husband! As an extraordinary measure, I couldn’t help but start a contract relationship. That is, with a handsome side character that looks better than the main one.\n\n“Why are you trying to avoid being engaged to the prince?”\n\n“He’s scary. I heard that he even kills his own entourage if he doesn’t like them.”\n\nA few days later, the prince sent a terrible letter to me.\n\n“I will not kill you.”\n\nOh no, did I set up another death trap for myself?\n\n---\nJuvelian is a villainess so hated by everyone that even her lover and father leave her to die a pitiful death. Just as she's about to face her fate, she gets the chance to change the course of her story. In order to avoid the tragic end she knows awaits her, she breaks up with her lover and gives up trying to win her father's love. Instead, she focuses on using his wealth to enjoy her new life to its fullest! But while she prepares for her extravagant life as a lady, her father begins looking for her new suitor. Afraid that he'll marry her off to the infamously unpredictable and stormy prince, she lands on a desperate solution: a dating contract. And the best candidate is none other than her father's student.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52616424)\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://wordexcerpt.com/series/daddy-i-dont-want-to-marry/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EB%B9%A0-%EB%82%98-%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%95%88-%ED%95%A0%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/2472), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56556599)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9772/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%88%B8%E7%88%B8%E6%88%91%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A/101)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ayah-Aku-Tidak-Mau-Menikah/37)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66124)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD_%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/125)","fr":"Juvelian est une personne si méchante que tout le monde la déteste, à tel point que même l'homme qu'elle aime et son propre père l'abandonnent à une mort pathétique. Alors qu'elle est sur le point de rendre l'âme, elle reçoit une opportunité de changer son destin. Afin d'éviter la fin tragique qui l'attend, elle rompt avec son petit copain et arrête d'essayer de gagner l'amour de son père. Elle décide plutôt de se servir de sa richesse pour profiter de sa vie au maximum ! Mais alors qu'elle se prépare à mener la vie fastueuse qu'elle a choisi de mener, son père se lance à la recherche d'un homme auquel la marier. Par peur de finir mariée à l'imprévisible prince au caractère houleux, elle prend une décision désespérée: une romance sur contrat. Et le meilleur candidat n'est autre que le disciple de son père...\n\n---\nJe me suis réincarnée dans le roman que je lisais en tant que la méchante Juvelian Eloy Floyen. J’étais destinée à mourir… Mais avec les souvenirs de mon ancienne vie, j’ai pu empêcher ma mort!\n\n«J’épouserai un homme qui a de l’honneur, de bonne famille et qui a du pouvoir.»\n\nAlors que je déclarais ma volonté de vivre une vie glorieuse et glamour, mon père a décidé de faire du prince héritier mon fiancé?! Est-il fou?!\n\n«Pourquoi évitez-vous votre engagement avec le prince héritier?»\n\n«Parce que ça me fait peur! Il tue les gens qui ne lui obéissent pas!»\n\nQuelques jours plus tard, le prince héritier m'a envoyé une lettre.\n\n«Ne t'inquiète pas, je ne te tuerai pas.»\n\nOh non… ai-je déjà fait quelque chose qui valait la peine de mourir?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52616424)\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://wordexcerpt.com/series/daddy-i-dont-want-to-marry/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EB%B9%A0-%EB%82%98-%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%95%88-%ED%95%A0%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/2472), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56556599)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9772/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%88%B8%E7%88%B8%E6%88%91%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A/101)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ayah-Aku-Tidak-Mau-Menikah/37)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66124)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD_%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/125)","hu":"Jubelian vagyok? A herceg lánya és ennek a regénynek a gazembere? Sikerült elkerülnöm a halálomat néhány korábbi tudással az életemről, mivel ez már a második alkalom. Képesnek kell lennem arra, hogy békés életet éljek! \"Nem fogok hozzámenni egy férfihoz sem, hacsak nincs meg mindene. A leggazdagabb, leghíresebb és legkompetensebb embert akarom.\" Elbűvölő életről álmodtam, mint a herceg lánya, de az apám azt mondja, hogy a koronaherceg, aki arról ismert, hogy őrült, legyen a férjem! Rendkívüli intézkedésként nem tudtam mást tenni, mint egy szerződéses viszonyt elindítani. Vagyis egy jóképű mellékszereplővel, aki jobban néz ki, mint a főszereplő. – Miért próbálja elkerülni, hogy eljegyezze magát a koronaherceggel? „Ijesztő. Azt hallottam, hogy még a saját kíséretét is megöli, ha nem szereti őket.”\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52616424)\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://wordexcerpt.com/series/daddy-i-dont-want-to-marry/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EB%B9%A0-%EB%82%98-%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%95%88-%ED%95%A0%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/2472), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56556599)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9772/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%88%B8%E7%88%B8%E6%88%91%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A/101)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ayah-Aku-Tidak-Mau-Menikah/37)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66124)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD_%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/125)","ru":"Я переродилась как Джубэлиан Элой Флойен – злодейка прочитанной мной новеллы. Я была обречена на смерть, но не тут-то было! Используя воспоминания о прошлой жизни, я собираюсь избежать своей гибели!\n\n«Я не выйду замуж за мужчину без чести, семьи, имущества и силы!»\n\nКак только я заявила о своём желании жить великолепной и роскошной жизнью, мой отец решил сделать меня невестой кронпринца! Он сумасшедший?! Ведь я буду рассматривать помолвку только в качестве крайней меры.\n\n«Почему ты избегаешь помолвки с наследным принцем?»\n\n«Он меня пугает! Он сразу же убивает тех, кто ослушался его!»\n\nЧерез несколько дней наследный принц отправил письмо.\n«Не переживай, тебя я не убью».\n\nО, нет… неужели я уже что-то натворила? Что-то, за что должна умереть?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52616424)\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://wordexcerpt.com/series/daddy-i-dont-want-to-marry/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EB%B9%A0-%EB%82%98-%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC-%EC%95%88-%ED%95%A0%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/2472), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56556599)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9772/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%88%B8%E7%88%B8%E6%88%91%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E7%B5%90%E5%A9%9A/101)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/father-i-dont-want-this-marriage-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Ayah-Aku-Tidak-Mau-Menikah/37)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66124)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD_%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/125)","uk":"Я переродилася в лиходійку новели, яку я читала, Джувеліан Елой Флоен. Я приречена на смерть, але ні! Зі спогадами про моє минуле життя я уникну \"прапорця смерті\"!\n-Я не одружуся на чаловікові, який не має ні честі, ні походження, ні власності, ні влади!\nЛишень я вимовила бажання прожити своє життя щасливо, мій батько вирішив зробити кронпринца моїм нареченим! Та він божевільний! Я розглядатиму ці заручини лише якщо не буде вибору.\n-Чому ти уникаєш заручин із кронпринцем?\n-Бо він лякає мене! Він вбиває на місці всіх, хто не скорився йому!\nКілька днів потому кронпринц надіслав мені листа:\"Не переймайся, я не вб'ю тебе.\"\nДідько, невже я заслуговую на таку смерть?\n\n---\n[Original Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.","ja":"宮中に名探偵誕生!?\n\n「小説家になろう」発! \nヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! \n中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。\n花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。\n持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?\n「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。","pl":"Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.\n\nNhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành \"nô lệ\" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.\n\nBất ngờ thay, việc làm \"nô lệ\" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu."},"links":{"al":"106064","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07TFBH966","ap":"mato-seihei-no-slave","bw":"series/191215/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2635180","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/527523","engtl":"https://yenpress.com/series/chained-soldier","kt":"54417","mal":"116880","mu":"151872","raw":"https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10834108156641784254"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

e1e54ea3-c012-4a7c-ac6e-b4e65bd253db:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e1e54ea3-c012-4a7c-ac6e-b4e65bd253db","title":{"en":"Seducing the Lady's Lover"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"백작 영애의 애인을 꼬셔라"},{"en":"Seduce the Count's Daughter's Lover"},{"en":"Seduce the Count's Eldest Daughter's Lover"},{"en":"I Must Seduce the Count's Daughter's Lover"},{"ru":"Я должна соблазнить любовника дочери графа"},{"vi":"Quyến rũ người tình của tiểu thư nhà bá tước"},{"ja":"伯爵令嬢の恋人を誘惑せよ"},{"zh":"勾引伯爵小姐的爱人"}],"description":{"ar":"أنا ليديل كروس. عندما بلغت الثامنة عشر من عمري ، حاصرني الإمبراطور في برج سحري واستخدمني بأي طريقة يراها مناسبة. كانت تلك هي الحياة التي عشتها قبل أن اعود. من أجل أن أكون سعيدًا خلال فرصتي الثانية في الحياة ، قررت الابتعاد عن أي شيء يتعلق بالسحر ، حتى أنني أصبحت خادمة لشخص ما. على الأقل ، هكذا كان من المفترض أن تكون ... \"أنت الشخص الوحيد الذي أملكه! ارجوك اسرقيه من ميلينا! أتوسل لك!\" انتظر لحظة ، سيدي. \"الصبي\" الذي تريد مني أن أخده من حبيبته لن يكون هو الخادم الشخصي ، الذي يبدو وجهه إلى حد كبير مثل وجه الإمبراطور ولا يمكنني التعود عليه ، أليس كذلك؟ مجرد النظر إلى وجهه يجعلني أشعر بالقلق ، وأنت تخبرني أن أغوي غراهام؟ ... ألن أكون قادرًا على عيش هذه الحياة بهدوء أيضًا؟\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B0%B1%EC%9E%91-%EC%98%81%EC%95%A0%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%A0%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%84-%EA%BC%AC%EC%85%94%EB%9D%BC/3358), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60221045)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/seducing-the-ladys-lover)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/125655)","en":"Ridel Cross is simply the fourth daughter of an ordinary knight, or at least, she was until her 18th birthday when she awakened her barrier magic skills. When the emperor learned of her magic skills, he summoned her to work for him. Sadly, “work” in the emperor’s definition meant being locked up in a magic tower to be treated worse than a slave and used as a tool. One day, after 10 long years of misery, Ridel cries herself to sleep while rueing the day she revealed her barrier magic. She silently wishes that she could go back to her 18th birthday and change her life. Magically, this wish does come true and Ridel wakes up back at home on the day of her 18th birthday. Upon realizing that she had returned to the past, she vows to live a life free of magic and becomes a maid at a count’s estate. Unfortunately, her dream of living a peaceful life comes crashing down when she sees the estate’s butler, Graham, who has the exact same facial features as the emperor in her previous life. Is she doomed to never escape the grasp of the emperor, or is this just some crazy coincidence?\n\n---\nI’m Lydel Cross. When I turned 18 the Emperor trapped me in a magical tower and used me in whatever way he saw fit. That was the life I lived before it was rewound. In order to be happy during my second chance at life, I decided to turn away from anything related to magic, even becoming the maid of a count. At least, that’s how it was supposed to be…\n\n“You’re the only person I have! Please steal him from Milena! I beg of you!”\n\nWait a moment, master. The ‘boy’ you want me to pull from her lady wouldn’t happen to be the butler, whose face looks so much like the Emperor’s I can’t get used to it, now would it? Just looking at his face makes me anxious, and you’re telling me to seduce Graham? …Will I not be able to live this life quietly either?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B0%B1%EC%9E%91-%EC%98%81%EC%95%A0%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%A0%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%84-%EA%BC%AC%EC%85%94%EB%9D%BC/3358), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60221045)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/seducing-the-ladys-lover)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/125655)","ru":"18-летняя Ридель Кросс была перерождена после того, как император использовал её в течение 10 лет. \"Этот раз я откажусь от магии и буду обычной служанкой в доме графа. Не так уж и плохая жизнь.\" Но спустя некоторое время граф поручил Ридель соблазнить Грэхэма, дворецкого своей дочери, который слухи называют её любовником. \"Но дворецкий слишком напоминает мне императора из моей прошлой жизни. To get away from her terrible home and live her last days in peace, she wants nothing more than to escape. Her chance comes when Grand Duke Noverdic asks her to marry his son, Cleor. Aquele casamento, eu… Eu vou me casar! Ela queria ser livre, então mesmo à beira da morte ela fez essa escolha. O lugar para onde ele foi parar, estranhamente em vez de se tornar o lugar certo para morrer, acabou sendo a mansão onde recebeu carinho e cuidados. Isabella, você não precisa ser tão formal. Você poderia me chamar de pai? Essa foi a hospitalidade infinita dos seus sogros. Mesmo que você morra, eu não vou deixar você ir. Descobriu a obsessão do seu noivo. Mais Riko en sait plus elle, parce que non seulement il est loin d'être strict, il est même plutôt attrayant sans ses lunettes. So, this is our story about our first love.\n\nWitness Haejun, Yoon, and Chanwook’s story about their first love through a webtoon.\n\n---\n\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Now, an older Martin desperately tries to find his sister.  \n  \n**Blanche**  \nBlanche's life was perfect. Her father, the mayor, was rich and she got everything she wanted. But one day her house blows up and she's left as the only survivor with no money at all. She vows revenge on the person who blew the house up and plans it with a strange boy she meets…  \n  \n**Backstage Mage**  \nLying on the floor after being beaten by his father, Aleister's mother died after saying \"I will be reborn. A magnificent bird comforts a struggling girl; a vampire waltzes with a young lady at night; a blind girl lives with a monster of whom there is more than meets the eye. This six-story manga collection by masterful manga creator Nagabe explores fascinating relationships that refuse to be confined.\n\n1. *Daisy, Mata Ashita* (デージー、またあした, *Until Tomorrow, Daisy*): A frail girl recovers with the help of an unlikely friend.\n2. *Ookami Ningen to Ningen Ookami* (オオカミニンゲンとにんげんおおかみ, *Man-Wolf and Wolf-Girl*): A man-wolf takes in a wild child.\n3. *Hijoushoku to Gochisou* (非常食とごちそう, *A Feast of Emergency Rations*): A humanoid vulture takes in a little girl.\n4. *Mayonaka no Waltz* (まよなかのワルツ, *Midnight Waltz*): A girl makes the acquaintance of a monstrous creature who believes himself to be quite human.\n5. *Shiro no Ou-sama* (しろ の おうさま, *The White King*): An albino boy and a white lion form a unique bond.\n6. *Mienai Hito-tachi* (みえないひとたち, *Invisible People*): The blind girl lives with a mysterious creature that somehow protects her. But the girl was aware. The creature is \"a horrible monster.\"\n\n**Note:** Stories 1 through 5 are included in  *[Love Stories Between Different Species](https://mangadex.org/title/4cc14713-e34c-456f-a8a1-a07084240199)*.","es":"Nagabe nos ofrece seis historias de amor entre niños y criaturas no humanas. Historias recopiladas:\n1. *Hasta mañana, Daisy*: Un pájaro gigante visita y ofrece regalos cada día a una niña enferma.\n2. *El hombre lobo y la lobezna humana*: Un lobo da cariño y una vida humana a una niña.\n3. *Ración de emergencia y festín*: Un pájaro antropomorfo recoge a una niña. ¿Será una mera ración de emergencia, un festín u otra cosa?\n4. *El vals de medianoche*: Cada noche se celebra un baile. En él, un vampiro y una niña danzan juntos.\n5. *El rey blanco*: Un humano frágil de tez pálida y una poderosa bestia blanca encerrada en una jaula.\n6. *Aquellos a los que no veo: Una niña ciega convive con un monstruo de aspecto aterrador.","fr":"1. *Daisy, Mata Ashita* (デージー、またあした, *A demain, Daisy*): Une fille frêle se guérit avec l'aide du ami improbable.\n2. *Ookami Ningen to Ningen Ookami* (オオカミニンゲンとにんげんおおかみ, *Le loup humain et la fille de loupLe loup humain et la fille de loup*): Un loup humain élève un enfant sauvage.\n3. *Hijoushoku to Gochisou* (非常食とごちそう, *Un banquet des provisions d'urgance*): Un vautour humanoïde élève une jeune fille.\n4. *Mayonaka no Waltz* (まよなかのワルツ, *Valse de minuit*): Une fille fait la connaissance du créature monstrueuse qui se croit être humain.\n5. *Shiro no Ou-sama* (しろ の おうさま, *Le roi blanc*): Un garçon albinos et un lion blanc forment un lien unique.\n6. *Mienai Hito-tachi* (みえないひとたち, *Les gens sans les yeux*): Une aveugle habite avec une créature mystérieuse qui la protège quelque part. Invisibile\n\ndall'autore di \"Girl from the Other Side\"","ja":"少女たちと――…大鳥、狼、鳥人、吸血鬼、ライオン、化け物。 \nながべが描くヘンテコな愛の物語。 \n\n●収録作品● \n1. 「デージー、またあした。」 \n贈り物を携えて、大鳥は足の悪い少女のもとを毎日訪れる。 \n2. 「オオカミニンゲンとにんげんおおかみ。」 \n狼が少女に与えるのは人間らしい暮らしと、愛。 \n3. 「非常食とご馳走。」 \n鳥人がひろった少女は“非常食\"か“ごちそう\"か、あるいは…。 \n4. 「まよなかのワルツ」 \n毎夜開かれる小さな舞踏会。少女と吸血鬼はワルツを踊る。 \n5. 「しろ の おうさま。」 \n檻の中で生きる白くて強い獣と、白くて弱い人間。 \n6. 「みえないひとたち。」 \n目の見えない少女は\"醜くおそろしい化け物\"と暮らす。 \n\n『異種恋愛物語集』収録作品を中心に、人外×少女の読み切り六作品を収録。 \n多様で豊かな関係性が描かれる珠玉の短編集がここに。","ko":"나가베가 그리는 인외와 소녀의 사랑 이야기.\n다양하고 풍부한 관계성이 그려진 주옥 같은 단편집이 여기.\n\n1. 「데이지, 내일 또 만나」\n선물을 가지고, 큰 새는 다리가 불편한 소녀를 매일 찾아온다.\n\n2. 「늑대인간과 인간늑대」\n늑대가 소녀에게 줄 수 있는 것은 인간다운 생활과 사랑.\n\n3. 「비상식량과 진수성찬」\n새 수인이 주운 소녀는 '비상식량'일까, '진수성찬'일까, 아니면….\n\n4. 「한밤의 왈츠」\n밤마다 열리는 작은 무도회. 소녀와 흡혈귀는 왈츠를 춘다.\n\n5. 「하얀 임금님」\n우리 속에 사는 하얗고 강한 짐승과 하얗고 약한 인간.\n\n6. 「보이지 않는 사람들」\n눈이 안 보이는 소녀는 '흉측하고 무시무시한 괴물'과 함께 살고 있었다."},"links":{"al":"119376","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07VJH3P9X/","bw":"series/213279","engtl":"https://sevenseasentertainment.com/books/love-on-the-other-side-a-nagabe-short-story-collection/","mal":"128807","mu":"m2esq1t","raw":"https://comic.pixiv.net/works/5869"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

Itu adalah rencananya, hanya untuk tergelincir dalam tunangan yang belum pernah terjadi dari seseorang yang membunuhnya pada putaran waktu yang sebelumnya, Putra mahkota dari negeri tetangga-?!","ja":"公爵令嬢リーシェの人生には大きな秘密があった――。 \nそれは“20歳で命を落としては婚約破棄の瞬間に戻ってしまう”こと。 \n\nこれまで商人や薬師、侍女などそれぞれで充実した時間を満喫したが７回目の今度の人生は、違った決意に満ちていた。 \n\n「今度こそ長生きをしてゴロゴロした生活を送りたい！」 \n\nだが、実行に移すべく城を飛び出そうとした矢先、皇国ガルクハインの皇太子アルノルトと邂逅を果たす。 \n\n彼こそ“騎士”だった前世でリーシェを殺害した張本人だった！ \nさらに、妙に気に入られ結婚まで申し込まれてしまい――!? \nゴロゴロしたい決意とは裏腹に、波瀾万丈な７回目の人生が始まる。","pt-br":"Rishe, filha de um duque, está presa em um loop temporal que sempre começa no momento em que seu noivado é anulado e termina com sua morte prematura aos 20 anos.
